mapper.select: SELECT directory_id as directoryId, name, uuid_name as uuidName, parent_directory_id as parentDirectoryId, is_deleted as deleted FROM directory WHERE parent_directory_id=#{parentDirectoryId} AND is_deleted=0 ORDER BY name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO directory(name, uuid_name, parent_directory_id, is_deleted) VALUES(#{name}, #{uuidName}, #{parentDirectoryId}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE directory SET parent_directory_id=#{parentDirectoryId} WHERE directory_id=#{directoryId}
UPDATE directory SET name=#{name} WHERE directory_id=#{directoryId}
UPDATE directory SET is_deleted=1 WHERE directory_id=#{directoryId}
